name: Prying Eyes
description:
Join the ranks of the Prying Eyes International and delve into the mysteries of the world's most tangled conspiracies. Uncover the crimes of sinister forces beyond comprehension, and peel away the veils of secrets that have been kept from the public eye.

In this immersive alternate reality experience, you'll navigate a web of intricate puzzles both in-game and in the real world, interacting with real-life websites, businesses, and non-playable characters that exist within our created universe.

STORYLINE

The Prying Eyes International is on high alert as the dangerous organization known as Fleur 'de Bleau rises to prominence, notorious for their heinous acts of kidnapping and murder. This French perfume chain has a dark secret - they extract the scents of murdered prostitutes and market it as their own product.

Established in Limoges in 1967 and now based in Paris, Fleur 'de Bleau is owned by the luxury conglomerate Fleur Linville. The name, meaning "bloom flower" in French, belies the horrific acts committed by the company.

As a member of the agency, it is your mission to bring an end to these crimes by solving a missing person case and uncovering the mastermind behind Fleur 'de Bleau. Armed with cutting-edge technology like a dedicated operating system, an AI assistant with free will, and access to a vast array of digital assets, you must gather clues, follow leads, and gather evidence to support the organization's investigation.

Can you solve the mystery and put an end to the bloodshed?

VIEW OUR ORIGINAL GAME CONCEPT HERE

NOTE: The game build is just a demo build for showcasing what's possible in the game + for judging purposes. The final build will be uploaded soon before the game jam ends.
